title: Kanata no Astra (Astra Lost in Space)
synopsis: In the year 2063, space travel is feasible and commercially available. As the cheerful Aries Spring arrives at the spaceport to attend a camp on the distant planet McPa, her purse is suddenly snatched by a reckless thief. Luckily, the athletic Kanata Hoshijima is able to retrieve it for her, and Aries soon discovers that he is among the group of teenagers who will be traveling with her on the excursion as team B-5.
characters: ['Hoshijima, Kanata', 'Spring, Aries', 'Raffaeli, Quitterie', 'Esposito, Luca', 'Lacroix, Charce', 'Zweig, Ulgar', 'Lu, Yunhua', 'Walker, Zack', 'Raffaeli, Funicia', 'Seira']
